SEARCH
Package controller.db.impl

Class JdbcClientDao

java.lang.Object
controller.db.impl.JdbcCustomerDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientDao
public class JdbcClientDao extends Object implements ClientDao
JdbcClientDao is an implementation of the ClientDao interface that provides data access operations for managing customer records in a relational database. This class facilitates the creation, retrieval, update, and deletion (CRUD) of customer data using JDBC for database interactions.

It interacts with the database to perform operations such as inserting new customers, updating existing customer details, deleting customers, and fetching customer information based on specific criteria such as ID or email.

Each method in this class is designed to throw a SQLException if an error occurs during database operations.

This class requires proper initialization of the database connection settings defined in the DatabaseConf class.

Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries
